continue
The function is used in loops to skip the rest of the loop body code and go to the next iteration.
Syntax
No parameters.
Note
The function is called using the
button, located in the Algorithm Editor on the "Algorithms" tabs.
Example
The following algorithm can be written to form a sheet according to the given conditions:
When condition 2=2 is checked, the block of statements containing the continue function will be executed, which will result in the transition to the next iteration, and the "
dstList.add(elem)
" part of the loop body will be skipped.
The result of this algorithm execution is: [1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10].
